user_settings.about.title: ABOUT
user_settings.about.text: Yamka is a messaging app that does not track you, does not have ads, does not ban people or groups and provides excellent customization. All official clients and the back end are free software distributed under Mozilla Public License 2.0.

e2ee_info.complete: This direct message channel is end-to-end encrypted. Nobody (even us) can read it except you and the person you're communicating with. You can make sure this is true by comparing this string and/or image to what's displayed on their screen in real life or using another app.
